title: Welcome to My Personal Site
text:
I’m a student at the Singapore Institute of Technology, majoring in Applied Artificial Intelligence.
I am deeply passionate about using AI to improve lives, especially in healthcare, productivity, and education.




Degree: Applied Artificial Intelligence @ SIT
Passions:

AI in healthcare

AI for productivity

Making education accessible with AI

AI Inspiration:
I believe AI can be a force for good, making knowledge accessible and boosting efficiency in meaningful ways.






AI Journey (Past Projects):
My key projects.
Learning Notes:
Notes and resources from my AI studies.
Hobbies:
Gym routines, motorcycles, and gaming.
Reflection on the use of GenAI:
My experience using GenAI tools for this assessment.






How I Learn:
I stay updated with AI through YouTube channels like Fireship and Andrej Karpathy.
Ethical Commitment:
I am committed to using AI for the good of humanity.


Thank you for visiting!
Feel free to explore and connect. If you have any questions or want to collaborate, don’t hesitate to reach out!

title: My Reflection
text:
In this page, I share my experience using GenAI tools to accomplish this assessment. I will discuss the tool I used, its benefits and challenges, and how GenAI may assist me in future work.



I used Perplexity AI as my main GenAI tool for this assessment.
I chose Perplexity because it provides concise, well-cited answers and supports markdown formatting, which is helpful for creating structured and readable content.





Idea Generation:
Perplexity helped me brainstorm and outline my thoughts efficiently.
Formatting Assistance:
The tool provided examples of markdown syntax, such as:

Lists
Hyperlinks (e.g., Perplexity AI)

Clarification:
Whenever I was unsure how to structure a section, I could ask for specific examples or guidance.






Saves time by quickly generating structured content.
Offers relevant examples and explanations.
Supports multiple markdown elements for better formatting.
Provides clear, well-organized answers.






Sometimes, the responses are too generic and need further customization.
It may not always understand highly specific or nuanced queries.
There is a risk of over-reliance, which could limit my own critical thinking.






Productivity:
GenAI can help automate repetitive writing and summarization tasks.
Learning:
It can explain complex concepts in simple terms, making self-study more effective.
Collaboration:
GenAI can assist in drafting reports, emails, and documentation in a professional setting.





Overall, I find GenAI tools like Perplexity to be valuable companions for both academic and professional tasks. However, it’s important to use them thoughtfully and always review the generated content to ensure accuracy and originality.

title: My Projects
text:
Welcome to my portfolio of previous projects!
Here, I showcase some of the key projects I have completed, highlighting my interests and skills in AI, software development, and problem-solving.



Description:
HDBHaven is a data-driven platform designed to empower aspiring homeowners, buyers, and sellers in Singapore with actionable insights into HDB flat prices. The project leverages Python to deliver a suite of interactive visualizations, enabling users to easily explore historical trends, compare different flat types, and uncover key price patterns across locations.

Technologies Used:
- Python (Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly) - RESTful API integration (data.gov.sg) - Jupyter Notebook

Key Features:
- Real-time Data Integration: Utilized an API to continuously retrieve up-to-date HDB resale data from data.gov.sg, ensuring analyses reflect the latest market conditions.

Insightful Visualizations: Developed a variety of charts and dashboards to help users intuitively understand price movements, demand hotspots, and affordability across different towns and flat types.
Price Prediction Model: Built and deployed a machine learning model that forecasts future resale prices for specific HDB flats, supporting more informed decision-making for buyers and sellers.

Link:
GitHub Repository




Description:
Space Shooter: Math Adventure is an educational arcade game designed to make learning math fun and engaging for kids. Developed as part of an Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) project, the game combines classic space shooter mechanics with interactive math challenges, effectively gamifying the learning experience.

Technologies Used:
- Java (OOP & SOLID principles) - libGDX game development framework

Key Features:
- Gamified Math Learning: Math problems are seamlessly integrated into the game, reinforcing concepts such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

Engaging Gameplay: Fast-paced space shooter action keeps players motivated and entertained as they practice math skills.

Link:
GitHub Repository




Description:
Astral Arc Computers is a fully developed e-commerce website created for a hypothetical PC retailer, designed to deliver a seamless and secure online shopping experience. The platform features essential e-commerce functionalities such as a dynamic product catalog, shopping cart, and a robust checkout process, allowing users to easily browse, select, and purchase computer components or systems.

A key focus of the project was on security and data integrity. We implemented best practices to safeguard against common web vulnerabilities, including input validation and sanitization to prevent SQL injection and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. All database interactions were carefully handled to ensure that sensitive user data and transactions remained protected.

Technologies Used:
- Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Ajax - Backend: PHP - Database: MySQL (managed with MySQL Workbench)

Key Features:
- Comprehensive Product Management: Users can browse a wide selection of PC components, view detailed product information, and add items to their shopping cart.

Shopping Cart & Checkout: Fully functional cart system that allows users to review, update, and remove items before proceeding to a secure checkout.
Database Security: Utilized prepared statements and rigorous input sanitization to defend against SQL injection and XSS exploits.

Link:
GitHub Repository

Feel free to explore the repositories above for more details, code, and documentation. If you have any questions about my projects or want to collaborate, please reach out!

title: My Hobbies
text:
Welcome to my hobbies page! While I’m passionate about Artificial Intelligence and technology, I also believe in living a well-rounded life. Here are some of the activities I enjoy outside of my academic and professional pursuits:



Staying active is important to me. I love hitting the gym, whether it’s for strength training, cardio, or just clearing my mind after a long day of coding. Fitness helps me maintain discipline, focus, and a healthy lifestyle.
Favorite activities:
- Weightlifting
- HIIT workouts
- Exploring new routines and challenges




Motorcycles are my passion and my escape. I enjoy learning about different bikes, going for rides, and keeping up with the latest in motorcycle culture. There’s nothing quite like the freedom of the open road and the thrill of two wheels.
Favorite aspects:
- Weekend rides with friends
- Exploring scenic routes
- Customizing and maintaining bikes




I believe that style is a form of self-expression. I enjoy keeping up with men’s fashion trends, experimenting with different looks, and finding ways to blend comfort with confidence.
What I enjoy:
- Curating versatile wardrobes
- Mixing classic and modern styles
- Following fashion influencers and brands




Gaming is a fun way for me to relax, connect with friends, and sometimes even find inspiration for coding and design.
Genres I like:
- Action-adventure
- Racing
- Strategy and simulation

Thanks for stopping by! If you share any of these interests or have recommendations, feel free to reach out-I’m always up for a chat about fitness, bikes, style, or games.
